job.title: Site Reliability Engineer
job.description:
Job Title:&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Sr. Windows SRE AdministratorDepartment:&nbsp;&nbsp;EIS – Traditional Services – Windows Group Location:&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Nomura NYC ( currently remote )Start:&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;As soon as possible.Overview:Nomura Windows group is a global team responsible for the maintenance and support of the Windows infrastructure systems used within the bank. The team plays a critical role and works closely with global counterparts in maintaining the production infrastructure and provide Windows related services to our clients.&nbsp;This is an exciting role and the successful candidate’s primary responsibility will be to provide support for the firm’s Windows infrastructure. The team operates in a follow the sun support model. &nbsp;The candidate must be a good team player, highly articulate, and be able to work well in a high pressure and technically challenging environment. The candidate should be passionate about supporting Windows based servers in highly virtualized environment. Good technical, communication and interpersonal skills are particularly important.&nbsp;Windows requirements:&nbsp;  - As a Windows SRE administrator, the candidate will expected to build software that will increase the efficiency of daily support.&nbsp;This will also include updating runbooks and support procedures.   
  - Knowledge of and Support of Operating System versions 2008, 2012 and 2019.   
  - Knowledge of Active Directoy administration and the ability to modify GPOs   
  - Candidate should be able to deploy and support MS Windows clusters.   
  - The ability to create active directory administration script, and Windows OS support scripts,&nbsp;via scripting languages (PowerShell&nbsp;is highly preferable, while ability in Python, VBScript, Jscript/JavaScript to achieve the scripting objective here is also a big plus )   
  - General support and administration of Anti-Virus such as Trend Micro and Windows Defender.   
&nbsp;Role / Principal Accountabilities·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Support and Manage Microsoft Windows based systems. ·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Responsible for looking at ways to improve and automate SRE items which include availability, latency, performance, efiiciency, and capacity planning·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Troubleshooting support and system performance issues.·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Handling of trouble tickets, user requests, proactive maintenance.·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Support weekend BCP / DR tests.·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Assisting application teams in post-configuration of new servers deployed.·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Candidate should have a good understanding of ITIL and Change management policies.·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Cordination with Infrastructure teams and Business IT managers to deliver projects on schedule.·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Implement engineered solutions to improve efficiency and stability of the infrastructure.·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Provide documentation for 1st line Operations team and maintain run books.·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Weekend oncall production support on a rotation basis.Skills & Experience Required:  - Familiarity with Site Reliability Engineering components   
  - Deep understanding of Windows OS, Cloud and associated tools.   
  - Deep understanding of active directory,&nbsp;and how enterprise class identity and access management (IAM) is extended from on-premises environment to public cloud.   
  - Cloud tools such as &nbsp;Ansible, Kubernetes, and Docker are a plus.   
  - Familiarity with Cyberark and Windows time services is a plus.   
  - Strong understanding of Virtual (VMware) and physical networking configuration.   
  - Strong ability to troubleshoot issues and provide resolution.   
  - Ability and desire to learn and work independently as well as in a team   
  - Project management and organizational skills.   
  - Strong written and verbal communication skills are a must.   
  - Analytical and disciplined approach to problem solving.   
  - Ability to establish and maintain effective working relationship with in the infrastructure teams.   
  - Previous experience with supporting a banking infrastructure is preferred.   
&nbsp;&nbsp;Additional qualifications:&nbsp;·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Hardware support for HP DL380 and Cisco B200 ·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;TCP/IP, Networks and Firewalls.·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Client/Server systems·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Familiarity with Enterprise Monitoring systems is desirable·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Good understanding of Information Security policies.
